body_html:
I have try head version from master, still bug

In [1]: import torch

In [2]: x = torch.rand(10, 10)

In [3]: y = x[:, 3]

In [4]: y
Out[4]:

 0.0497
 0.6632
 0.7263
 0.5071
 0.7504
 0.3432
 0.7698
 0.5947
 0.6670
 0.0003
[torch.FloatTensor of size 10]

In [5]: torch.max(y, 0)
Out[5]:
(
  0.7698
 [torch.FloatTensor of size 1],
  0
 [torch.LongTensor of size 1])

In [6]: y = x[:, 3].clone()

In [7]: y
Out[7]:

 0.0497
 0.6632
 0.7263
 0.5071
 0.7504
 0.3432
 0.7698
 0.5947
 0.6670
 0.0003
[torch.FloatTensor of size 10]

In [8]: torch.max(y, 0)
Out[8]:
(
  0.7698
 [torch.FloatTensor of size 1],
  6
 [torch.LongTensor of size 1])

body:
I have try head version from master, still bug

```
In [1]: import torch

In [2]: x = torch.rand(10, 10)

In [3]: y = x[:, 3]

In [4]: y
Out[4]:

 0.0497
 0.6632
 0.7263
 0.5071
 0.7504
 0.3432
 0.7698
 0.5947
 0.6670
 0.0003
[torch.FloatTensor of size 10]

In [5]: torch.max(y, 0)
Out[5]:
(
  0.7698
 [torch.FloatTensor of size 1],
  0
 [torch.LongTensor of size 1])

In [6]: y = x[:, 3].clone()

In [7]: y
Out[7]:

 0.0497
 0.6632
 0.7263
 0.5071
 0.7504
 0.3432
 0.7698
 0.5947
 0.6670
 0.0003
[torch.FloatTensor of size 10]

In [8]: torch.max(y, 0)
Out[8]:
(
  0.7698
 [torch.FloatTensor of size 1],
  6
 [torch.LongTensor of size 1])
```
